DOC.brief_summary: This study is to investigate the effects of AVANDIA on the asthmatic response.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Of AVANDIA On The Late Asthmatic Response
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Mild asthmatic treated with shortacting beta agonists only, nonsmoker. Exclusion criteria: Inability to abstain from medications other than shortacting beta agonists and paracetamol. Recent administration of steroids. Recent respiratory infection or exacerbation of asthma.
